citeinfo.origin: NC DENR Division of Coastal Management
citeinfo.title: 2011 Average Annual Long-Term Erosion Rates
citeinfo.othercit: The 2009 Shoreline was digitized using 2009 USDA NAIP imagery: http://www.fsa.usda.gov/FSA/apfoapp?area=home&subject=prog&topic=nai

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: This polyline shapefile represents 2011 average annual long-term erosion rates (ft/yr).
descript.purpose: These values were calculated in 2011 for the purpose of updating oceanfront erosion rates. In North Carolina, erosion rates are used to develop construction setback measured from the first line of stable-natural vegetation, or a static vegetation line.

idinfo.useconst: Free to use. Any edits or modifications to the attribute values will make these data null and void.

procstep.procdesc: ~ Early shorelines digitized from NOAA/USGS NOS T-Sheets and/or imagery. ~ 2009 shoreline digitized using 2009 USDA NAIP Imagery ~ Distance between the two shorelines on any given transect (change rate) was measured using the USGS's Digital Shoreline Analysis System (DSAS) - http://woodshole.er.usgs.gov/project-pages/dsas/

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_South_endpoint, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=NULL, the default accuracy=4.4 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[End Point Rate (EPR)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_all_rates_20100726_090831.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_South_endpoint, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=NULL, the default accuracy=1 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[End Point Rate (EPR)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_all_rates_20100726_100120.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_South_endpoint, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=NULL, the default accuracy=1 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[End Point Rate (EPR)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_all_rates_20100726_111738.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_South_endpoint, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=NULL, the default accuracy=4 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[End Point Rate (EPR)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_all_rates_20100727_150454.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_ALL_South_DSAS, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=UNCERT_M, the default accuracy=4 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[Shoreline Change Envelope (SCE), Net Shoreline Movement (NSM), End Point Rate (EPR), Linear Regression Rate (LRR), Weighted Linear Regression (WLR), Least Median of Squares (LMS)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_South_rates_20100804_094039.
Dataset copied.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_ALL_South_DSAS, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=UNCERT_M, the default accuracy=4 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=nearest, stats calculations=[Shoreline Change Envelope (SCE), Net Shoreline Movement (NSM), End Point Rate (EPR), Linear Regression Rate (LRR), Weighted Linear Regression (WLR), Least Median of Squares (LMS)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=99.9%, Output rate table name=Transects_South_rates_20100805_114300.

Rate Calculations Performed. Parameters Used: shoreline layer=Shorelines_ALL_South_DSAS, shoreline date field=DATE_, shoreline uncertainty field name=NULL, the default accuracy=4.4 meters, shoreline intersection parameters=farthest, stats calculations=[Shoreline Change Envelope (SCE), Net Shoreline Movement (NSM), End Point Rate (EPR), Linear Regression Rate (LRR), Least Median of Squares (LMS)], shoreline threshold=none, confidence interval=95%, Output rate table name=Transects_South_rates_20101230_094356.
